objects.text:
• Adjustable Height Design
• Hidden Storage Compartment
• Durable Wood Construction

product_details.description: Overall size of coffee table: 41”L x 19.5”W x 19”-24.5 H. Adjustable Height: Coffee table´s innovative design with hidden compartment and lift tabletop can be adjusted vertically from 19’’ to 24.5 to meet your different demands of desired height. Just lifting it effortlessly, there is extra storage room provided. And the stability will also be guaranteed while adjusting. Storage Construction: Made of chipboard, solid wood and metal piece, Tangkula coffee table features large storage rooms with 3 divided storage design, which can well accommodate your various kinds of accessories or stuffs, such as your notebooks, glasses or other things. Practicable Design: Our coffee table is widely applied in office or home as a perfect coffee table or living room furniture for its spacious work area. Its compact structure and beautiful texture can surprisingly highlight your office or home decor, perfect for your office, living room, or study. Brand - Tangkula ** Product Dimensions - 19"D x 41"W x 24.5"H ** Maximum Weight Recommendation - 220 Pounds ** Color - White ** Product Care Instructions - Wipe with Dry/Damp Cloth **

banner_details:
This banner features a clean, well-structured layout that highlights a modern lift-top coffee table. The left half of the banner uses a rounded rectangle background filled with a warm brown color to host textual information, creating an inviting and cohesive feel. The product is displayed prominently on the right side using a high-quality image of the coffee table with functional compartments. 

The main heading (`heading`) uses bold, uppercase typography to emphasize the product type. A supporting subheading (`subheading`) reinforces its purpose as a space-saving solution. Below is a short bulleted list (`description`) outlining product benefits. The price (`price`) appears inside a rounded white container for emphasis. A distinct call-to-action button (`cta` and `cta_background`) encourages immediate interaction. Decorative arrows direct the viewer’s attention toward the product image (`product_image`).

**Color Palette:**
- Warm Brown: #8B6B4C
- Soft White: #FFFFFF
- Light Gray Background: #F5F5F5

This layout maintains a balanced composition and visual clarity, ideal for online advertisements and eCommerce product promotions.
product_color: The product image showcases a modern lift-top coffee table with a minimalist design, ideal for a workspace or living area. The primary color is a clean **white** (#FFFFFF), used on the body of the table, creating a crisp and spacious look. The tabletop contrasts with a rich **walnut brown** (#6F4E37), drawing attention to the lift mechanism and adding warmth. Accents from props like books and decor introduce **muted earthy tones** such as **sage green** (#9AA89D), **beige** (#D8C9B6), and **light grey** (#D3D3D3). These tones blend subtly while emphasizing a cozy, modern aesthetic, ideal for clean and calm ad banner backgrounds.
